{{Lang|'''Ningguang'''|zh=凝光|zh_rm=Níngguāng|zh_tl=Condensed Light}} is a playable [[Geo]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the Tianquan of the [[Liyue Qixing]] and owns the floating [[Jade Chamber]] in the skies of [[Liyue]].
